channel.title: HomeKit all the things! on
channel.description: Recent content in HomeKit all the things! on

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: TLDR: We do use cookies only to improve your experience. Information we collect and what we use it for We use Google Analytics to track which pages users reads the most and who our users are. The following information is collected: Time of visit, pages visited, and time spent on each page of the webpages Referring site details (such as the URI a user came through to arrive at this site) Type of web browser Type of operating system (OS) JavaScript support, screen resolution, and screen color processing ability High approximate location Clicks on links leading to external websites Scroll depth Interactions with site-specific widgets A lot of stuff that no one has thought of yet.
